solution.content:
Question 1 – WACC with Risky Debt (60 points)
Firm J has the following capital structure:
Current Structure:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Debt (D): $300m market value
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Equity (E): $700m market value
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Total value (V): $1,000m
Current Costs:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Expected return on debt (r_D): 5%
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Cost of equity (r_E): 12%
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Corporate tax rate (τ_C): 30%
________________


A. Compute current WACC (10 pts)
Use the standard WACC formula: $$\text{WACC} = \frac{D}{V}r_D(1-\tau) + \frac{E}{V}r_E$$
Show your calculation clearly.
________________


B. WACC with increased default risk (20 pts)
Suppose Firm J increases leverage, causing:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Expected r_D rises to 8% (higher default risk)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * r_E rises to 14% (higher financial leverage)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * D/E ratio remains constant at 300/700
Recompute WACC under these new parameters.
Show your work. Did WACC increase, decrease, or stay the same?
________________


C. Why WACC can increase with leverage (15 pts)
In 4-5 sentences, explain why WACC may increase when leverage rises beyond a certain point, even though debt is cheaper than equity.
Your answer should reference:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * The trade-off between tax shields and distress costs
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * How r_D and r_E both rise with default risk
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * The "U-shaped" WACC curve in trade-off theory
________________


D. Connection to optimal capital structure (15 pts)
In 4-5 sentences, connect your findings to optimal capital structure in trade-off theory.
Discuss:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Optimal leverage occurs where WACC is minimized (firm value maximized)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Beyond that point, marginal distress costs exceed marginal tax benefits
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * How your example in part B illustrates this trade-off
________________

solution.content:
Question 2 – Short Conceptual Questions (40 points)
Answer each part briefly but completely.
________________


A. Callable vs non-callable debt (15 pts)
In 4-5 sentences, compare callable vs non-callable debt from the firm's perspective.
Discuss:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * When would the firm exercise the call option (refinance when rates fall)?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * Why callable debt gives the firm flexibility
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * The trade-off: lower flexibility cost vs higher coupon (investors demand compensation)
________________


B. Callability shifts risk (15 pts)
In 3-4 sentences, explain how callability shifts risk between the firm and investors.
Address:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * Who bears interest rate risk (reinvestment risk) under callable bonds?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * Why this is a zero-sum transfer (firm's gain = investors' loss)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * Whether this creates or destroys total value
________________


C. Why investors demand higher yields on callable bonds (10 pts)
In 3-4 sentences, explain why investors demand higher yields on callable bonds compared to similar non-callable bonds.
Reference:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * The embedded call option held by the issuer
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * Investors' compensation for giving up upside when rates fall
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * Whether this is fair compensation (option pricing logic)
________________

solution.content:
Question 2 – Short Conceptual Questions (40 points)
Answer each part briefly but completely.
________________


A. Off-balance-sheet financing (15 pts)
In 4-5 sentences, explain:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             1. What off-balance-sheet financing is (e.g., operating leases, SPVs, joint ventures)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             2. Why firms use it (improve leverage ratios, avoid covenant violations, regulatory arbitrage)
Be specific about one example.
________________


B. Investor wariness (15 pts)
In 3-4 sentences, explain why investors are wary of excessive off-balance-sheet activity.
Discuss:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * Hidden leverage and opaque risk
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * Enron-style scandals (contingent liabilities not disclosed)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * Whether "substance over form" should govern accounting
________________


C. Real-world example (10 pts)
Give one real-world example of off-balance-sheet financing.
In 3-4 sentences, describe:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * The structure (e.g., operating leases for airlines, VIE structures)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * Why the firm chose this structure
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             * Whether accounting rules have changed to limit it (e.g., new lease accounting standards)
________________

solution.content:
Question 2 – Short Conceptual Questions (40 points)
Answer each part briefly but completely.
________________


A. Industry differences in leverage capacity (15 pts)
In 4-5 sentences, explain why it is easier to sustain high leverage in stable, asset-heavy industries (e.g., utilities, real estate) than in R&D-heavy tech firms.
Your answer should reference:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   * Asset tangibility and collateral value
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   * Cash flow predictability
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   * Growth options and flexibility needs
________________


B. Equity issuance in distress (15 pts)
In 4-5 sentences, explain how issuing equity during financial distress can transfer value from existing to new shareholders.
Discuss:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   * Why equity might be undervalued in distress (asymmetric information)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   * The wealth transfer mechanism
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   * Whether this is an efficient outcome
________________


C. Conservative financial policy despite tax benefits (10 pts)
In 3-4 sentences, explain why a firm might adopt conservative financial policy (low leverage) even when tax benefits of debt are large.
Consider: financial flexibility, underinvestment costs, stakeholder relationships, reputation.
________________

worked_examples.problem_statement: Firm O issues a 7-year bond: Bond Terms: ●​ Coupon rate: 7% (annual) ●​ Current price: 95% of par ●​ Face value: $100m (assume for calculations) Market Parameters: ●​ Risk-free 7-year rate: 3% ●​ Corporate tax rate: 21% Default Assumptions: ●​ All default risk concentrated at maturity (year 7) ●​ If default occurs: recovery = 40% of face value ●​ If no default: bondholders receive all promised payments A. Promised yield to maturity (10 pts) Compute the promised YTM on the bond (ignoring default risk in this calculation). Set up: Price = PV(Coupons) + PV(Principal) at rate y Solve for y. Show your setup.
