worked_examples.title: Recourse vs Non-Recourse Debt
worked_examples.problem_statement: Firm W is considering a large project. Two financing options: Option A: Recourse corporate debt ●​ Lenders have full recourse to all firm assets Option B: Non-recourse project debt ●​ Lenders have claims only on project assets and cash flows ●​ No recourse to other firm assets A. Difference in lender claims (15 pts) In 4-5 sentences, explain the difference in terms of lender claims in default. Discuss: ●​ Recourse: lenders can seize all firm assets ●​ Non-recourse: lenders limited to project assets only ●​ Implications for lender risk and recovery

sub_questions.question_text: Interest rate differences (15 pts)
Risk partitioning (15 pts)
When sponsors accept higher cost (15 pts)

workflow.extract: Pull key parameters from problem statement

solution.content:
Question 1 – Recourse vs Non-Recourse Debt (60 points)
Firm W is considering a large project. Two financing options:
Option A: Recourse corporate debt
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Lenders have full recourse to all firm assets
Option B: Non-recourse project debt
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Lenders have claims only on project assets and cash flows
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * No recourse to other firm assets
________________


A. Difference in lender claims (15 pts)
In 4-5 sentences, explain the difference in terms of lender claims in default.
Discuss:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Recourse: lenders can seize all firm assets
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Non-recourse: lenders limited to project assets only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Implications for lender risk and recovery
________________


B. Interest rate differences (15 pts)
In 3-4 sentences, explain why non-recourse loans typically have higher interest rates than recourse loans.
Discuss:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Higher lender risk (limited recovery)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Lenders price in the loss of recourse
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Whether this is efficient risk allocation
________________


C. Risk partitioning (15 pts)
In 4-5 sentences, explain how the non-recourse structure partitions risk between firm equity and project lenders.
Discuss:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Project risk is isolated from other firm operations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Lenders bear project-specific risk
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Equity (parent firm) has limited downside exposure to project failure
________________


D. When sponsors accept higher cost (15 pts)
In 3-4 sentences, explain when sponsors might accept higher cost in exchange for non-recourse structure.
Consider:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Risk isolation (protecting parent from project failures)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Preserving debt capacity for other projects
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Regulatory or strategic reasons
________________

worked_examples.problem_statement: A project requires $300m investment. Project cash flows at t=1: State Probability Project CF Bad 40% $50m Good 60% $100m Discount rate: 10% Two Financing Options Option A: Recourse corporate debt ●​ Face value: $300m ●​ Interest rate: 8% ●​ Lenders have recourse to all firm assets (assume firm has other assets worth $200m) Option B: Non-recourse project debt ●​ Face value: $300m ●​ Interest rate: 12% (higher due to no recourse) ●​ Lenders limited to project cash flows only

solution.content:
Question 3 – Multi-State Recourse Example (80 points)
A project requires $300m investment. Project cash flows at t=1:
State
	Probability
	Project CF
	Bad
	40%
	$50m
	Good
	60%
	$100m
	Discount rate: 10%
Two Financing Options
Option A: Recourse corporate debt
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Face value: $300m
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Interest rate: 8%
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Lenders have recourse to all firm assets (assume firm has other assets worth $200m)
Option B: Non-recourse project debt
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Face value: $300m
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Interest rate: 12% (higher due to no recourse)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Lenders limited to project cash flows only
________________


A. Payoffs under each structure (25 pts)
For each state and each financing option, compute:
Recourse debt:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1. Total available to lenders = Project CF + Other firm assets ($200m)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2. Lender payoff = min(Total available, Debt claim)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      3. Sponsor (equity) payoff = Residual
Non-recourse debt:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1. Lender payoff = min(Project CF, Debt claim)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2. Sponsor payoff = max(Project CF - Debt claim, 0) + Other firm assets ($200m, unaffected)
Build a payoff table.
________________


B. Lender recovery in bad state (20 pts)
In 3-4 sentences, compare lender recovery in the Bad state under each structure.
Show numerically:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Recourse: lenders recover more (can claim other assets)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Non-recourse: lenders recover less (limited to project CF)
________________


C. Pricing and sponsor payoffs (20 pts)
In 5-6 sentences, explain how the difference in lender recovery affects:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1. Interest rates: Why non-recourse demands higher rate (12% vs 8%)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2. Expected sponsor payoff: Which structure is better for sponsor in expectation?
Consider:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Trade-off between higher interest cost and downside protection
________________


D. Project selection in multi-project firm (15 pts)
In 4-5 sentences, discuss how the recourse vs non-recourse choice shapes project selection in a multi-project firm.
Consider:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Non-recourse encourages taking riskier projects (limited downside for sponsor)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Recourse imposes discipline (sponsor bears full downside)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Whether this affects optimal project portfolio
________________

worked_examples.problem_statement: Firm X has a dual-class share structure: Class A (Public): ●​ 60 million shares outstanding ●​ 1 vote per share Class B (Founders): ●​ 10 million shares outstanding ●​ 10 votes per share (supervoting) ●​ Held entirely by founders

sub_questions.question_text: Vote share vs cash flow share (15 pts)
Leverage choices under dual-class (15 pts)
Agency problems from control-cash flow wedge (15 pts)
Debt market response (15 pts)

workflow.extract: Pull key parameters from problem statement

solution.content:
Question 1 – Dual-Class Shares and Control (60 points)
Firm X has a dual-class share structure:
Class A (Public):
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * 60 million shares outstanding
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * 1 vote per share
Class B (Founders):
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * 10 million shares outstanding
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * 10 votes per share (supervoting)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Held entirely by founders
________________


A. Vote share vs cash flow share (15 pts)
Compute:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1. Founders' vote share: (10m × 10) / Total votes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2. Founders' cash flow share: 10m / Total shares (assume equal cash flow rights)
Total votes = (60m × 1) + (10m × 10) Total shares = 70m
Show your calculations.
________________


B. Leverage choices under dual-class (15 pts)
In 4-5 sentences, explain how dual-class structure can affect leverage choices.
Discuss:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Founders can entrench themselves with either low or high leverage
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Control without proportional cash flow stake
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Whether this leads to higher or lower leverage than one-share-one-vote (ambiguous—explain both directions)
________________


C. Agency problems from control-cash flow wedge (15 pts)
In 4-5 sentences, explain how separating control rights from cash flow rights creates agency problems.
Discuss:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Founders bear only 14% of cash flow consequences but control 100% of decisions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Empire building, pet projects, or excessively risky strategies
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Private benefits of control vs shareholder wealth maximization
________________


D. Debt market response (15 pts)
In 4-5 sentences, explain how debt markets might respond to extreme control concentration.
Discuss:
