worked_examples.title: Distress Risk and Credit Spreads
worked_examples.problem_statement: A 5-year corporate bond has the following characteristics: Bond Parameters: ●​ ●​ ●​ ●​ Face value: $100 Annual coupon: 6% Current price: $96 Risk-free 5-year yield: 3% Default Assumptions: ●​ Recovery in default: 40% of face value ●​ Default can only occur at maturity (t=5) ●​ No default before maturity A. Promised YTM (10 pts) Compute the bond's promised yield to maturity (YTM). Use the bond pricing formula: $$\text{Price} = \sum_{t=1}^{5} \frac{\text{Coupon}}{(1+\text{YTM})^t} + \frac{\text{Face}}{(1+\text{YTM})^5}$$ Show your calculation (approximation acceptable).

sub_questions.question_text: Credit spread and implied default probability (20 pts)
Why spreads exceed expected losses (15 pts)
Asset liquidity and spreads (15 pts)

workflow.extract: Pull key parameters from problem statement

solution.content:
Question 1 – Distress Risk and Credit Spreads (60 points)
A 5-year corporate bond has the following characteristics:
Bond Parameters:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Face value: $100
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Annual coupon: 6%
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Current price: $96
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Risk-free 5-year yield: 3%
Default Assumptions:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Recovery in default: 40% of face value
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Default can only occur at maturity (t=5)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * No default before maturity
________________


A. Promised YTM (10 pts)
Compute the bond's promised yield to maturity (YTM).
Use the bond pricing formula: $$\text{Price} = \sum_{t=1}^{5} \frac{\text{Coupon}}{(1+\text{YTM})^t} + \frac{\text{Face}}{(1+\text{YTM})^5}$$
Show your calculation (approximation acceptable).
________________


B. Credit spread and implied default probability (20 pts)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1. Compute the credit spread = YTM - Risk-free rate
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2. Using risk-neutral pricing, infer the implied default probability
Under risk-neutral pricing: $$\text{Expected payoff} = (1-p) \times 100 + p \times 40$$
where p = probability of default
Set PV of expected payoff (at risk-free rate) equal to current price and solve for p.
Show your work.
________________


C. Why spreads exceed expected losses (15 pts)
In 4-5 sentences, explain why credit spreads typically exceed expected loss rates even in well-functioning markets.
Discuss:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Risk premium: Investors demand compensation for bearing default risk
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Liquidity premium: Corporate bonds less liquid than Treasuries
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Taxes: Different tax treatment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Systematic risk: Defaults correlate with bad economic states
________________


D. Asset liquidity and spreads (15 pts)
In 4-5 sentences, explain how improving asset liquidity (collateral quality, marketability) could reduce credit spreads even if default probabilities remain unchanged.
Your answer should reference:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Higher recovery rates in default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Reduced losses conditional on default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Greater investor confidence
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Whether this is a first-order or second-order effect
________________

solution.content:
Question 4 – Debt Maturity and Credit Cycles (60 points)
A. Maturity choice and credit spreads (20 pts)
In 4-5 sentences, explain why firms might prefer:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Longer maturities when credit spreads are low
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Shorter maturities when credit spreads are high
Discuss:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Locking in favorable rates vs waiting for improvement
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Rollover risk considerations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Market timing opportunities
________________


B. Risks of extreme maturity choices (20 pts)
Describe:
One risk of locking in very long-term debt at low spreads (3-4 sentences)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Consider: Covenant rigidity, reduced flexibility, opportunity cost if conditions improve
One risk of rolling short-term debt repeatedly (3-4 sentences)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Consider: Rollover risk, refinancing at unfavorable terms, liquidity crises
________________


C. Maturity walls and systemic risk (20 pts)
In 3-4 sentences, explain how "maturity walls" (large amounts of debt maturing simultaneously) can create systemic risk.
Discuss:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Concentration of refinancing needs
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Market capacity constraints during stress
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Potential for cascading defaults
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Policy responses (central bank interventions)
________________


[End of

Natural hedge analysis (25 pts)
When foreign borrowing becomes speculation (20 pts)

workflow.extract: Pull key parameters from problem statement

solution.content:
Question 2 – Executive Compensation and Risk-Taking (40 points)
Answer each part briefly but completely.
A. Options, leverage, and risk-taking (15 pts)
In 4-5 sentences, explain why heavily option-based CEO compensation in a highly leveraged firm creates strong incentives for risk-taking.
Discuss:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Options have convex payoffs (benefit from volatility)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Leverage amplifies equity volatility
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Limited downside for executives (options expire worthless at worst)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Potential misalignment with debtholders and firm value
________________


B. Compensation design to temper risk (15 pts)
Describe one compensation design that tempers excessive risk-shifting incentives.
In 4-5 sentences, explain:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * The specific design (e.g., more restricted stock, fewer options)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Why this reduces risk-taking incentives
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Whether it eliminates the problem or just reduces it
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Trade-offs involved
________________


C. Debt covenants as substitute (10 pts)
In 2-3 sentences, explain how debt covenants can act as a partial substitute for better compensation design in controlling managerial risk-taking.
Consider:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Covenants directly restrict risky actions (asset sales, dividends, additional debt)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Whether covenants fully solve the problem or just constrain it
________________

solution.content:
Question 2 – Pecking Order vs Market Timing (40 points)
Answer each part briefly but completely.
A. Contrast pecking order vs market timing (20 pts)
In 4-5 sentences, contrast the pecking order theory vs market timing theory of equity issuance.
Your answer should explain:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Pecking order: Firms avoid equity due to adverse selection; prefer internal funds, then debt, then equity
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Market timing: Firms issue equity when overvalued, repurchase when undervalued
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Different underlying mechanisms (information asymmetry vs mispricing)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Different predictions about issuance timing
________________


B. Distinguishing the theories (20 pts)
Give:
One scenario consistent with pecking order for a firm issuing equity (3-4 sentences)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Example: Profitable firm with large investment needs exhausts debt capacity
One scenario consistent with market timing for the same firm (3-4 sentences)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      * Example: Stock price recently doubled, P/E ratio at historical highs
In 2-3 sentences, explain how an outside investor could distinguish which explanation is more plausible.
________________
